duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate scheduling to ensure service delivery in a single-family home and assist with continuous quality improvements in service management, and compliance with DHS (245D) licensing regulations.
Provide oversight of program services delivery including mediation administration, meal planning and preparation.
Contribute to successful execution of admissions, and program planning processes at the direction of the Residential Program Administrator.
Assure the management and delivery of all contracted services.
Provide supervision and training of Direct Support Professionals.
Assist those living in the home to complete personal and medical cares.
Collect data and complete documentation of service delivery.
Function as the representative and main point of contact for Direct Support Professionals working in the home and the individuals living in the home.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Human Services, Psychology, or related field (Master's preferred)
